review.body: Thanks very much for this PR! From looking at the original code it seems indeed that it has a logic flaw for this case. However, please also add a test case triggering it -- thus showing this code patch corrects it. Or stated another way: The current CI test case setting "NOPUBKEY_IN_PRIVKEY" doesn't seem to detect this flaw -- this must be improved going forward.

pull_request.title: Do not print non-existing public key in NOPUBKEY_IN_PRIVKEY
pull_request.body:
When the provider is configured with NOPUBKEY_IN_PRIVKEY=ON, the public key component could be missing in a private key and thus leads to a NULL pointer dereference when printing.

<!-- Please give a brief explanation of the purpose of this pull request. -->

<!-- Does this PR resolve any issue?  If so, please reference it using automatic-closing keywords like "Fixes #123." -->

<!-- Once your pull request is ready for review and passing continuous integration tests, please convert from a draft PR to a normal PR, and request a review from one of the OQS core team members. -->

pull_request.title: get encoder library from smaller repo, avoid silently failing if enco…
pull_request.body:
- Gets encoder library from smaller repository
- Avoid encoding tests silently fail if algorithm/encoding is not found
- Points to new upstream encoder version with updated OID

Fixes #129 
Fixes #130
